level.heading: General duties of Mayor.
level.text: The Mayor is hereby required to administer the provisions of this chapter. As soon as practicable after the return is filed, the Mayor shall examine it and shall determine the correct amount of tax.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-158
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-158, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.
